title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1728-5.1 - Inventory control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1728-5.1 - Inventory control

State Regulations

Inventory records will be maintained for appliances, office and maintenance equipment, tools and similar project property of a
nonexpendable nature having a unit cost of $500 or more. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1728-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
